name: Polterheist (itch) (maclo4)
description:
Play as Baddie Boo to steal as much from the superstore as possible. Careful, don't get caught by ghoulish guards!




Credits:
Scott Howard - Gameplay Developer and Designer

Johanna Roa - Lead Artist and Gameplay Designer

Daniel Cobb - Soundtrack Composer

Zach Bouren and David Lewis - Test Rats
